settings.heading: Refund Policy
settings.row_content:
30-day return policy for unused items with tags. Damaged items inspected upon reception. Certain items, like perishables and custom products, are non-returnable. No returns on sale items or gift cards. Exchanges through separate purchases. EU customers have a 14-day cooling-off period. Refunds processed within 10 business days.

settings.heading: Shipping Policy
settings.row_content: Orders processed in up to 2 days. Shipping details and costs revealed during checkout. Delivery times vary by location. Customers must provide accurate shipping details. Tracking info emailed upon shipment. Check packages for damage upon receipt. Shipping addresses cannot be changed post-processing; verify details before confirming.

settings.heading: Recommendations and frequently asked questions to give you the best shopping experience to Maxi Dresses
settings.row_content:
What is a maxi dress and why should you consider it? A maxi dress is a long, elegant garment that reaches to the ankle or the floor. It is versatile, comfortable and perfect for various occasions.

How can I choose the perfect maxi dress for my body type?
Know your silhouette and look for a dress that flatters it. For example, empire cuts are ideal for apple-shaped figures, while dresses with belts create curves for rectangular silhouettes.

What fabrics and cuts are best suited for a maxi dress? The choice of fabric is crucial. Opt for chiffon for daytime events and velvet for evening occasions. Also, consider cut-out cuts to add a sexy touch.

What colors and prints are trending in maxi dresses? Solid colors are safe, but don't be afraid of prints. Vertical designs can visually lengthen the figure, and small prints are ideal for hiding specific areas.

What accessories best complement a maxi dress? Accessories are key. A belt can define the waist, and a statement necklace will focus attention on the face. Less is more, so choose carefully.

What shoes go well with a maxi dress? The choice of footwear is essential. Flat sandals or sneakers for a casual look, and wedges or heels for something more formal.

How to adapt a maxi dress to different occasions? Change accessories according to the occasion. From the office to dinner, you only need a change of accessories to transform your look.


What details should I take into account when buying a maxi dress? Consider the length, the drape of the fabric and details such as ruffles or slits. Also, try different styles to find the one that makes you feel comfortable and radiant.

How can I feel confident and stunning when wearing a maxi dress? Trust is key. Choose a dress that makes you feel good about yourself and enjoy the elegance and versatility that a maxi dress offers. ðŸŒŸðŸ‘—âœ¨

settings.heading: All about fashion in Maxi Dresses

settings.text:
Maxi dresses are versatile garments for various occasions. Here are some interesting facts about them:

Maxi dresses come in a variety of styles, both for everyday fashion and special occasions.
Long sleeve bohemian dresses.
Light styles for summer.
Romantic evening dresses for weddings and special events.

Find your favorite shades and floral prints,
Explore different cuts, from elegant bodycon dresses to classic A-line, shirt and wrap dresses.
Discover elegant satin dresses or simple cotton styles.


Maxi dresses are comfortable and allow greater mobility. Plus, lightweight styles are ideal for hot summer days.
Black maxi dresses are undoubtedly one of those timeless elements that have stood the test of time, standing out for their elegance and versatility.
